Clientcide.desc: The Clientcide namespace. Includes a method that allows you to set the location of image files to your own server; download the files @ google code; see docs.

dbug.desc: Wrapper for the firebug console.log() function.

Class.ToElement.desc: Mixin class that returns *this.element*. Allows you to do $(myInstance).

FixPNG.desc: Fixes transparent png files and dom elements with transparent png backgrounds for IE6

Popup.desc: A Class wrapper for window.open that provides a more pleasant interface than the default window.open arguments.

DollarE.desc: Brings back $E from MooTools 1.11. Returns a single Element for a selector.

DollarG.desc: Returns a collection when given an element, a collection of elements, an element id, or a selector.

Fx.Marquee.desc: A simple marquee effect for fading in and out messages.

Modalizer.desc: Provides functionality to overlay the window contents with a semi-transparent layer.

ObjectBrowser.desc: Creates a tree view of any javascript object.

StyleWriter.desc: Provides a simple method for injecting a css style element into the DOM if it's not already present.

StickyWin.Fx.desc: Extends StickyWin to create popups that fade in and out.

StickyWin.Drag.desc: Extends StickyWin to create popups that fade in and out and are draggable.

StickyWin.Modal.desc: This script extends StickyWin class to add Modalizer functionality.

StickyWin.Ajax.desc: Adds ajax functionality to all the StickyWin classes.

StickyWin.alert.desc: The function in this script just makes a little alert box with a close button.

StickyWin.UI.desc: Creates an html holder for in-page popups using a default style.

StickyWin.UI.Pointy.desc: Similar to StickyWin.ui, this is a wrapper for content, this time a tip with a pointer.

StickyWin.PointyTip.desc: A convenience library to place a StickyWin.UI.Pointy relative to an element on the page easily.

Tips.Pointy.desc: Creates Tips using the StickyWin.PointyTip layout.

Waiter.desc: Adds a semi-transparent overlay over a dom element with a spinnin ajax icon.

Collapsable.desc: Enables a dom element to, when clicked, hide or show (it toggles) another dom element. Kind of an Accordion for one item.

HoverGroup.desc: Manages mousing in and out of multiple objects (think drop-down menus).

HtmlTable.desc: Builds table elements with methods to add rows quickly.

MenuSlider.desc: A simple dropdown class; see the menu at the top of Clientcide.com.

MooScroller.desc: Recreates standard scrollbar behavior for elements with overflow using DOM elements styleable by css.

MultipleOpenAccordion.desc: Creates a Mootools Accordion that allows the user to open more than one element.

SimpleCarousel.desc: Builds a carousel object that manages the basic functions of a generic carousel.

SimpleSlideShow.desc: Makes a very, very simple slideshow gallery with a collection of dom elements and previous and next buttons.

TabSwapper.desc: Handles the scripting for a common UI layout; the tabbed box.

Confirmer.desc: Fades a message in and out for the user to tell them that some event (like an ajax save) has occurred.

DatePicker.desc: Allows the user to enter a date in any popuplar format or choose from a calendar.

DatePicker.Extras.desc: Allows the user to enter a date in any popuplar format or choose from a calendar.

Fupdate.desc: Handles the basic functionality of submitting a form and updating a dom element with the result.

Fupdate.Append.desc: Uses Fupdate to fetch and update a DOM element, but appends the result into the target instead of overwriting its contents.

Fupdate.Prompt.desc: Extends Fupdate and Fupdate.Append to use a popup (StickyWin) for the form.

InputFocus.desc: Adds a 'focused' class to inputs when they have focus.

ProductPicker.desc: Allows the user to pick a product from a data source.

SimpleEditor.desc: A simple html editor for wrapping text with links and whatnot.

TagMaker.desc: Prompts the user to fill in the gaps to create an html tag output.

Autocompleter.Local.desc: Allows Autocompleter to use an object in memory for autocompletion (instead of retrieving via ajax).

Autocompleter.Remote.desc: Allows Autocompleter to get data from a remote server (using Request - a.k.a. Ajax).

Autocompleter.JSONP.desc: Allows Autocompleter to get data from a remote server using Request.JSONP (script injection).

Autocompleter.Observer.desc: Used by Autocompleter to monitor an input for changes.

Autocompleter.Clientcide.desc: Extends Autocompleter to automatically inject the css styles.

CiUI.desc: CNET's iPhone UI. No dependencies (see docs and svn for demos, css, and images that accompany this script). Important: Don't include this script for anything except a mobile app.

SimpleEditor.Dutch.desc: SimpleEditor messages in Dutch (feel free to send in your own translations).

SimpleEditor.French.desc: SimpleEditor messages in French (feel free to send in your own translations).

SimpleEditor.Portuguese.desc: SimpleEditor messages in Portuguese (feel free to send in your own translations).

SimpleEditor.Spanish.desc: SimpleEditor messages in Spanish (feel free to send in your own translations).

Element.Delegation.desc: Delegates events for child elements to their parents for greater efficiency.
